__e: I don't understand why I have to follow Brett and his stupid band.
I suppose maybe you could help me, huh? 'Cause Brett and me, we're hungry, and we wanna know what the fuck you're gonna do about it!
I have to get something from Brett's house, and I don't want to go alone.
Well, they aren't here, maybe Brett went to look for them.
I came by because your boy Brett came by the house and, uh, told me to come help you.
I'm happy 'cause now people will know that you're not some God with all the answers, and if Brett had to get a little stung on the way, then I can deal with it.
